item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

4. What is the point of an online conference? (5 points | 1 comment)

6. Demystifying the regular expression that checks if a number is prime (2016) (11 points | 2 comments)

8. A conserved fertilization complex bridges sperm and egg in vertebrates (13 points | 3 comments)

15. Wait Until 8th (290 points | 223 comments)

26. Activeloop (YC S18) seeks Python back end engineers to build a database for AI ( | hide)
27. Claude for Desktop (210 points | 152 comments)

29. Show HN: Shimmer – ADHD-adapted body doubling (82 points | 83 comments)
